Blog.post: this week was crazy, sunday i was at my uncles house until 10:30 that nite, monday i was at chris's house chillin with him and Dj and lumpy. then tuesday i went with Dj chris lumpy and chelsea to gratons house got wasted it was fun... , got to see my chris adn my angela that made my week, i went adnd saw Dj before he left . now im grounded for a week b/c i went to c him last njite.... this suxx!! but itz all good. ill b ok. i love my chris and my angela!!!

today! i am in manchester at my uncles house for the day, until my mommy pics me up at 6:00, then hopefully im goin to Angelas house! my baby thug!! lol but if i dont ill b at chris's house than to angelas house, so since i cant call my mommy angela is gonna try all day to call her and ask if i can go over, which i prolly will lol so me n angela n frenchy will b chillin yay !! well i have gotz nothin else to write!! i lvoe u angela and chris!! mwah!

chris, you truly are amazing! i dont kno what i would have done through last years school year with out you. even tho u were helpin me with other problems that im sure you didnt want to , i adore u ur the sweetest guy ive met all year and thats the truth. adn whether you believe it or not i can kick ur ass! whipped cream!! ha ha angela i love u girl dont worry ill alwayz b here. baby powder! u guys r great and im comin to see u as soon as i can dont worry! love baby thug kaite

silhouettes silhouettes above the cradle hold me down they won't let me go the wrong way my mother taught me all the fables, told me how in the end all the sinners have to pay but... i don't wanna live like my mother i don't wanna let fear rule my life and i don't wanna live like my father i don't wanna give up before i die he worked so hard his bones are breaking he wore them down but long ago he lost the feeling his good intentions leave me shaking, show me how i don't ever want to end up like he did and... i don't wanna live like my mother i don't wanna let fear rule my life and i don't wanna live like my father i don't wanna give up before i die when i have kids i won't put any chains on their wrists, i won't i'll tell them this there's nothing in this world that you can't be if you want it enough AnGeLa & My SONG!! angie u got me hooked! this some is the best!!

my life is crazy, but id have to say its what keeps me from drowning into a sorrow pitiful daze most people fall into. my friends, god i dont know where id be without them. especially these two people, they are pretty much the only ones who i can rely on and can trust, and the only ones i can be my self around. its great to kno that i have these two people in my life and i dont know what i would do with out them. Angela~ ur my girl! Baby Thugz 4 life, lol my mom is a dork i kno. but anywayz i owe u alot, im not sure but its ur advice and thoughts that keep me from makin bad decisions or the wrong ones its funny, all the times i have asked u advice, its turned out good. i dont know what id do with out you love you. chris* frenchy! ur the greatest, when im around u guys i feel like i can do whatever i want , like actually be myself and not care what anyone thinks, i feel like im on top of the world. i dont kno what i would do wit out u ur so sweet too. and yea i still think i can kick ur ass. lol love you ** you two are the greatest thing that has happened to me. ur the greatest friends i have* hugs n kisses katie

first of all wednesday me my mommy her boyfriend n my brother were at my moms bosses house house sittin for her cuz she is campin with her husband in da white mountains. thursday me n derek spent tha day in tha pool n chillin around da house... now im at my uncles house my momy is still house sittin till sunday! friday <> im babysittin for my uncles girl... saturday i am babysittin again for my uncles girl so ill b here n saturday nite im gon b goin bac to my moms bosses hosue to chill till sunday nite wen i get to see my chris * frnechy* n my baby thug angela!!! CANT WAIT!! chris i kno how much u luv me dont worry lol angela i kno u luv me more! but itz ok well im out 4 now love alwayz baby thug katie xoxox
